address: Xã Lộc Phú, Huyện Bảo Lâm, Tỉnh Lâm Đồng
thought:
**Determining the New Ward for "Xã Lộc Phú, Huyện Bảo Lâm, Tỉnh Lâm Đồng"**

Okay, I've got a straightforward task: identify the new administrative unit (ward) for the old address "Xã Lộc Phú, Huyện Bảo Lâm, Tỉnh Lâm Đồng."  My approach will be methodical, leveraging my understanding of Vietnamese administrative restructuring.

First, I note the province: Tỉnh Lâm Đồng.  Since restructuring often involves changes within provinces, I begin with the relevant resolutions. I quickly check if province mergers are in play, but resolution 60-NQ/TW clarifies that Lâm Đồng remains Lâm Đồng, although it merged with Đắk Nông and Bình Thuận.

Next, I turn my attention to resolutions concerning the province of Lâm Đồng. I'm specifically looking for any resolutions related to administrative rearrangements at the commune level. Resolution 1671/NQ-UBTVQH15 catches my eye. This looks promising as it specifically addresses the rearrangement of administrative units at the commune level in Lâm Đồng.

I'll now carefully scan each entry within 1671/NQ-UBTVQH15, looking for "Xã Lộc Phú." I need to see which existing communes are being combined to form a new one, as that will be the key to the new ward name.  After going line by line, I hit paydirt: line 31 states that "Xã Lộc Phú, Lộc Lâm and B'Lá" are merged into a new commune: "Xã Bảo Lâm 4." This appears to be the answer.

To be absolutely certain, I'll cross-reference this information with the list of "New Wards" I have. I will look for the exact entry for "Xã Bảo Lâm 4, Tỉnh Lâm Đồng" and that `ward_code`, which I can see is "25063". The match confirms my findings!

This is a direct mapping as the resolution explicitly states that  "Xã Lộc Phú" is merged into "Xã Bảo Lâm 4." Therefore, my confidence is high. I'll now construct the JSON output and submit my findings.

citation.header: 1671/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lâm Đồng
citation.line: 31. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Lộc Phú, Lộc Lâm và B'Lá thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Bảo Lâm 4.
